text: In 2000, I attended Britney Spears'Oops!... I Did It Again Tour'at Manchester Arena with my best friend and Mum, wearing a pink'Baby One More Time'T - shirt and my hair in Spears - inspired pigtails. The second I saw the then 19 - year - old Mississippi born singer step onto the stage with a microphone headset, I distinctly remember bursting into tears until her final song,'Lucky '. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below No seriously, I uncontrollably blubbed throughout the whole concert that my Mum repeatedly had to ask me to sit down and take some deep breathes between songs.
